mapper.select:
SELECT id, sxzfq_name, sxpl_value, bpqpl_value, zpl_value, xxpl_value, system_name, tzsl_value, xxsl_value, tzfs_name, xdbm_code, content, xzb_value, error_content, remark, DATE_FORMAT(cj_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as cjTime, wzl_value, other_user_code, other_kx_code, other_user_title, other_kx_title, qrxd_value, qrxd_content, zhsj_content, passport_remark, mobile_unit_value, data_value, position_code, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createTime , DATE_FORMAT(edit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as editTime, pro_code_machine, pro_code_manual FROM wlsms_data where 1=1
and (sxzfq_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or system_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') )
and DATE_FORMAT(cj_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(cj_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wlsms_data (sxzfq_name, sxpl_value, bpqpl_value, zpl_value, xxpl_value, system_name, tzsl_value, xxsl_value, tzfs_name, xdbm_code, content, xzb_value, error_content, remark, cj_time, wzl_value, other_user_code, other_kx_code, other_user_title, other_kx_title, qrxd_value, qrxd_content, zhsj_content, passport_remark, mobile_unit_value, create_time, edit_time, position_code, data_value, pro_code_manual, pro_code_machine) VALUES ( #{sxzfqName}, #{sxplValue}, #{bpqplValue}, #{zplValue}, #{xxplValue}, #{systemName}, #{tzslValue}, #{xxslValue}, #{tzfsName}, #{xdbmCode}, #{content}, #{xzbValue}, #{errorContent}, #{remark}, #{cjTime}, #{wzlValue}, #{otherUserCode}, #{otherKxCode}, #{otherUserTitle}, #{otherKxTitle}, #{qrxdValue}, #{qrxdContent}, #{zhsjContent}, #{passportRemark}, #{mobileUnitValue}, now(), now(), #{positionCode}, #{dataValue}, #{proCodeManual}, #{proCodeMachine} )
mapper.select:
SELECT id, sxzfq_name, sxpl_value, bpqpl_value, zpl_value, xxpl_value, system_name, tzsl_value, xxsl_value, tzfs_name, xdbm_code, xzb_value, DATE_FORMAT(cj_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as cjTime, wzl_value, position_code, pro_code, state, user_no FROM wlsms_manual_data where 1=1
and (sxzfq_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or system_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or pro_code like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%'))
and DATE_FORMAT(cj_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(cj_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and pro_code = #{proCodeManual}
order by id desc

SELECT id, wx_name, zpl_value, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, DATE_FORMAT(cj_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as cjTime, zzb_value, tzys_name, position_code, pro_code, state, user_no FROM wlsms_machine_data where 1=1
and (wx_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or tzys_name like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%') or pro_code like concat('%',#{queryBt},'%'))
and DATE_FORMAT(cj_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(cj_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and pro_code = #{proCodeMachine}
order by id desc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wlsms_manual_data ( sxzfq_name, sxpl_value, bpqpl_value, zpl_value, xxpl_value, system_name, tzsl_value, xxsl_value, tzfs_name, xdbm_code, xzb_value, cj_time, wzl_value, position_code, pro_code, user_no, create_time, edit_time ) VALUES
( #{item.sxzfqName}, #{item.sxplValue}, #{item.bpqplValue}, #{item.zplValue}, #{item.xxplValue}, #{item.systemName}, #{item.tzslValue}, #{item.xxslValue}, #{item.tzfsName}, #{item.xdbmCode}, #{item.xzbValue}, #{item.cjTime}, #{item.wzlValue}, #{item.positionCode}, #{item.proCode}, #{item.userNo}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO wlsms_machine_data ( wx_name, zpl_value, dpl_value, tkpl_value, xh_type, msl_value, zzb_value, tzys_name, cj_time, position_code, pro_code, user_no, create_time, edit_time ) VALUES
( #{item.wxName}, #{item.zplValue}, #{item.dplValue}, #{item.tkplValue}, #{item.xhType}, #{item.mslValue}, #{item.zzbValue}, #{item.tzysName}, #{item.cjTime}, #{item.positionCode}, #{item.proCode}, #{item.userNo}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT pro_code, position_code, DATE_FORMAT(cj_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as cjTime FROM wlsms_manual_data where state = 0 group by pro_code order by cj_time desc
SELECT pro_code, position_code, DATE_FORMAT(cj_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as cjTime FROM wlsms_machine_data where state = 0 group by pro_code order by cj_time desc
select count(*) as count from admin_user
select count(*) as count from wlsms_alarm_data
select count(*) as count from admin_role
select sum(count) from (select count(*)as count from wlsms_manual_data wmd union all select count(*) as count from wlsms_machine_data wmd2) as addAll
select count(*) as count from admin_operation
select count(*) as count from wlsms_machine_data
select count(*) as count from wlsms_data
